title._content: [Portrait of Stan Kenton and Laurindo Almeida, 1947 or 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Stan Kenton and Laurindo Almeida, 1947 or 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 182 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Kenton, Stan Almeida, Laurindo Stan Kenton Orchestra Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Conductors (Music)--1940-1950. Pianists--1940-1950. Big bands--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Cityscape photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
